entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 26 March 2023
